main event: A single luminous object was observed by a military unit in Oran, Algeria on August 15, 1952.
interesting points: The object was seen to go behind a hill, but no noise was heard.
A previous sighting of a luminous ball of fire was reported in Ain Sefra, Algeria on August 12, 1952.
The object in Ain Sefra was observed to race across the sky, stop, and then drop before seemingly exploding, but no noise was heard.
The report does not mention any photographs being taken.
The duration of the Oran sighting was 2-3 minutes.
